00062 //_____ D E F I N I T I O N S ______________________________________________

00069 bit   usb_connected=0;
00070 
00076 bit   usb_suspended=0;
00077 
00078 
00079 
00080 
00087 extern U8  usb_configuration_nb;

00089 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N S ____________________________________________
00090 
00103 void usb_device_task_init(void)
00104 {
00105    Usb_disable();
00106    Usb_enable();
00107 #if (USB_LOW_SPEED_DEVICE==ENABLE)
00108    Usb_low_speed_mode();
00109 #endif
00110    Usb_enable_vbus_pad();
00111    Usb_enable_vbus_interrupt();
00112    Enable_interrupt();
00113 }
00114 
00128 void usb_start_device (void)
00129 {
00130    Usb_freeze_clock();
00131 #ifndef USE_USB_AUTOBAUD
00132    Pll_start_auto();
00133 #else
00134    usb_autobaud();
00135 #endif
00136    Wait_pll_ready();
00137    Usb_unfreeze_clock();
00138    Usb_attach();
00139 #if (USB_RESET_CPU == ENABLED)
00140    Usb_reset_all_system();
00141 #else
00142    Usb_reset_macro_only();
00143 #endif
00144    Usb_enable_suspend_interrupt();
00145    Usb_enable_reset_interrupt();
00146    Enable_interrupt();
00147    usb_init_device();         // configure the USB controller EP0
00148 }
00149 
00160 void usb_device_task(void)
00161 {
00162    if (usb_connected == FALSE)
00163    {
00164      if (Is_usb_vbus_high())    // check if Vbus ON to attach
00165      {
00166        Usb_enable();
00167        usb_connected = TRUE;
00168        usb_start_device();
00169        Usb_vbus_on_action();
00170      }
00171    }
00172 
00173    if(Is_usb_event(EVT_USB_RESET))
00174    {
00175       Usb_ack_event(EVT_USB_RESET);
00176       Usb_reset_endpoint(0);
00177       usb_configuration_nb=0;
00178    }
00179 
00180    // Here connection to the device enumeration process
00181    Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00182    if (Is_usb_receive_setup())
00183    {
00184       usb_process_request();
00185    }
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 #ifdef USE_USB_AUTOBAUD
00190 #warning CAUTION Preliminary USB autobaud for USB DFU bootloader Only... 
00203 void usb_autobaud(void)
00204 {
00205 
00206    U16 count_rc=0;
00207 
00208    volatile U16 tempo;
00209    
00210    Wdt_change_interrupt_16ms();
00211    TCCR1B=0x00; TCCR1A=0x00;
00212    TCNT1=0x00;  TIFR1=0x01;            
00213    
00214    TCCR1B|=(1<<CS01) |(1<<CS00);       // ClkIO/64, with prescaler /2 -> XTAL/128
00215 
00216    while(Is_not_wdt_interrupt());
00217    Wdt_ack_interrupt();
00218    TCCR1B=0;
00219    Wdt_off();
00220 
00221    
00222    count_rc=TCNT1;
00223    TCCR1B=0x00; TCCR1A=0x00;
00224    TCNT1=0x00;  TIFR1=0x01;            
00225    if(count_rc>1500)                   // 16MHz/128 with 16ms watchdog gives 2000 ticks
00226    {
00227       Start_pll(PLL_IN_PRESCAL_ENABLE);               
00228    }
00229    else
00230    {
00231       Start_pll(PLL_IN_PRESCAL_DISABLE);                
00232    }
00233    
00234 }
00235 #endif
